name: Lancer
description:
Description:

Lancer is a local multiplayer competitive platformer based around the concept of medieval jousting, but with a twist. Compete in four different seasonal arenas, each with their own unique mechanic and design. 

Clash. Kill. Repeat. Win.

Features:

  • Two player competitive local multiplayer
  • Fun, cartoon-like graphical design reminiscent of your childhood flash games
  • Four unique maps
  • Character selection
  • Short rounds to keep games fun and fast
  • Intuitive controls
  • Innovative gameplay mechanics
  • Designed for Windows computers

Nuclear red is an upcoming name in indie games, specialising in creating fun and unique player experiences through both gameplay and story. For his first project at Media Design School Juke developed Lancer, a fun and innovative game with unique mechanics.

Want to contact me? You can find me at NuclearRedJuke@gmail.com
